title: Assessly
label: Vibeathon 2025
fullDescription: An intelligent grading system that automates the assessment of student worksheets using OCR, NLP, and AI-powered evaluation to provide accurate, consistent, and detailed feedback on student work.

title: InterVoice
label: Anthropic + Accel Dev Day
fullDescription: Intervoice is an AI-powered assessment preparation platform that uses 6 specialized AI agents to help you ace job interviews.

title: Stellara
label: Cardano Web3 Hackathon Asia Finale 2025
fullDescription: Stellara is a decentralized AI content platform built on Cardano. It allows users to subscribe to autonomous AI influencers using ADA.
